attributes.action: Tax and impose the same emmisions on Planes Trains and Buses to the same level as the motorist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Impose and enforce the same level of tax and emmisions restrictions on planes trains and buses to the equivilent level that is paid by the motorist. The government is hell bent in taxing and road pricing the motorist off the road for ennvironmental reasons, but why shouldn't other forms of transport be as ennvironmentally penalised?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
